block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Frank J. Campbell 3d of Gladwyne, Pa., have announced December wedding plans for Mr. Campbell's daughter, Cynthia Anne Campbell, and Brian Curtis Crochiere, the son of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crochiere Jr. of Malvern, Pa.

Miss Campbell, 25 years old, is a daughter also of the late Dorothy Robb Campbell. She graduated from the Agnes Irwin School and the University of Pennsylvania. Her father is a founder and a managing director of the Pennsylvania Merchant Group, an investment banking firm in Radnor, Pa., and a former governor of the Philadelphia, Baltimore and Washington Stock Exchange.

Mr. Crochiere, 25, graduated from the Haverford School and the University of Virginia. He is a commercial insurance broker with Posse-Walsh Inc., in Blue Bell, Pa. His father, who is retired, is a former eastern sales manager of Liftex Inc., in Ivyland, Pa., manufacturers of industrial slings.

Her father is a founder and a managing director of the Pennsylvania Merchant Group, an investment banking firm in Radnor, Pa., and a former governor of the Philadelphia, Baltimore and Washington Stock Exchange.

Mr. Crochiere, 25, graduated from the Haverford School and the University of Virginia. He is a commercial insurance broker with Posse-Walsh Inc., in Blue Bell, Pa. His father, who is retired, is a former eastern sales manager of Liftex Inc., in Ivyland, Pa., manufacturers of industrial slings.
